entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 12:30 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
